name: Gravital (Maxens1011)
description:
Gravital is my first year  project at the IIM, and i yearn to become a game developper one day, i'll try to add more levels and features as i improve in game programming.

Aside from the death animation which is an explosion made by Ansimuz :

https://ansimuz.itch.io/explosion-animations-pack

and the background planets made with Pixel Planets (great generator :] ) made by Deep-Fold :

https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator

I made all of my assets, which will one day be available to download on this site !

I dont know if the game demo is playable on any device other than Windows computers, i'm quite new to this stuff.

Enjoy !                                                                                                                                                       Maxens1011
